pages.text: Ambition has taken hold of you, seriously. These are your first big leaps towards changing the world.\Empowered by the potent energy of your [Onyx](book://general/onyx_shards) and [Stratine](book://resources/stratine), this second organism you created is clearly... more active than your last creation.\\**And DEFINITELY hungrier.**\**WAY hungrier.**

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Maybe one of the sturdiest materials you know can satisfy their hunger? What has to be done has to be done.

pages.title: Neolith
pages.text: The Obsidian was literally pulverized. This is what you call power!\\The result was this sturdy reagent.\Very powerful.\Yes.
